title: Jumpin' Jack Flash (Captioned)
creator_credit: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation, Lawrence Gordon, Joel Silver and Penny Marshall
brief_description: Whoopi Goldberg stars in this action adventure comedy hit. There’s music, murder, mayhem and a lot of laughs as she tries to save an endangered spy operative, code-named Jack - even though she’s never met him! Now the CIA and the KGB have her jumpin’ and the world may never be the same.
creator_credit_for_label: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation, Lawrence Gordon, Joel Silver and Penny Marshall
